mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.level, a.sort, a.permission, a.icon, a.is_show, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, `href`, `level`, `sort`, permission, icon, is_show, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{level}, #{sort}, #{permission}, #{icon}, #{isShow}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, `name` = #{name}, `href` = #{href}, `level` = #{level}, sort = #{sort}, permission = #{permission}, icon = #{icon}, is_show = #{isShow}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
